gene.function: FUNCTION: Probable large-conductance Ca(2+)-activated chloride channel. May play a role in Ca(2+) signal transduction. {ECO:0000269|PubMed:15010458}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Cell membrane {ECO:0000269|PubMed:15010458}; Multi-pass membrane protein {ECO:0000269|PubMed:15010458}.
geneOntologyMolecularFunction: intracellular calcium activated chloride channel activity [GO:0005229]
